articles.title: KL Rahul's animated chat with Sanjiv Goenka: Storm in a teacup, says LSG coach - India Today
articles.description: IPL 2024 Lucknow bowling coach Lance Klusener played down the chatter around an animated chat between captain KL Rahul and owner Sanjiv Goenka after their 10-wicket defeat in Hyderabad last week The former South African all-rounder said the mood in the dressi…
articles.content: Lucknow bowling coach Lance Klusener played down the animated chat between captain KL Rahul and owner Sanjiv Goenka, saying it's a storm in a teacup. Klusener said he doesn't see any problem with a "… [+2608 chars]
